zone.name: Elwynn Forest
zone.description: A tranquil woodland realm dotted with farms and small communities, Elwynn Forest serves as the heartland of the Kingdom of Stormwind. But beneath its peaceful canopy lurk dangers — bandits, gnolls, and fouler things threaten the good people who call this forest home.

locations.name: Northshire Abbey
locations.description: A serene monastery nestled in a quiet valley. Paladins and priests train here, and it serves as a haven for new adventurers taking their first steps into the wider world.

connections.description: A path winds through the vineyards.
The road leads south toward Goldshire.

points_of_interest.name: Abbey Entrance
points_of_interest.description: The grand wooden doors of the abbey stand open, welcoming all who seek refuge.

points_of_interest.name: Training Dummies
points_of_interest.description: Straw dummies set up for combat practice.

locations.name: Northshire Vineyards
locations.description: Rows of grapevines stretch across the hillside. Workers tend the vines, though they cast nervous glances toward the forest edge.

connections.description: The abbey's spires are visible over the hills.
A dirt road heads south.

locations.name: Elwynn Crossroads
locations.description: A well-traveled intersection where the roads from Northshire, Goldshire, and the western farms converge. A lone guard keeps watch.

connections.description: The road climbs toward Northshire Abbey.
The main road continues to Goldshire.
A smaller path leads into the western woods.
A trail winds toward the eastern forest.

locations.name: Goldshire
locations.description: A bustling village centered around the Lion's Pride Inn. Merchants hawk their wares, trainers offer instruction, and adventurers gather to share tales and seek work. The heart of Elwynn Forest.

connections.description: The north road leads to the crossroads.
A peaceful path leads to Crystal Lake.
A farm road leads to the Stonefield property.
The road continues south to the Maclure Vineyards.
A worn path leads toward the mines.

points_of_interest.name: Lion's Pride Inn
points_of_interest.description: A warm, welcoming tavern. The smell of roasting meat and fresh bread wafts from within.

points_of_interest.name: Blacksmith
points_of_interest.description: The ring of hammer on anvil echoes from the forge.

points_of_interest.name: Town Square
points_of_interest.description: A small plaza where locals gather to trade gossip and goods.

locations.name: Crystal Lake
locations.description: A serene lake with crystal-clear waters. Fishermen cast their lines from the shore, though lately murlocs have made the waterfront dangerous.

connections.description: The path returns to Goldshire.
The shore continues along the water's edge.
A lumber trail leads to the logging camp.

points_of_interest.name: Fishing Dock
points_of_interest.description: A wooden dock extends into the lake. Abandoned fishing gear lies scattered about.

points_of_interest.name: Murloc Hovels
points_of_interest.description: Crude huts made of reeds and mud dot the shoreline.

locations.name: Crystal Lake Shore
locations.description: The eastern shore of Crystal Lake. Murloc presence is stronger here, and their gurgling cries echo across the water.

connections.description: Follow the shore back west.

locations.name: Eastvale Logging Camp
locations.description: A rugged camp where loggers harvest timber from the forest. The workers are hardy folk, but recent murloc and gnoll attacks have put everyone on edge.

connections.description: A trail leads back toward the lake.
The forest grows dense to the east.

points_of_interest.name: Lumber Mill
points_of_interest.description: A large sawmill where logs are processed into timber.

points_of_interest.name: Worker Tents
points_of_interest.description: Canvas tents where the loggers sleep.

locations.name: Eastern Elwynn Woods
locations.description: Dense forest east of the logging camp. Spiders have spun their webs between the ancient trees, and wolves prowl in the shadows.

connections.description: The logging camp lies to the west.
A dark hollow lies deeper in the woods.

locations.name: Mother Fang's Hollow
locations.description: A shadowy grove dominated by an enormous dead tree draped in thick webs. This is the lair of Mother Fang, a giant spider queen.

connections.description: Retreat through the webbed trees.

points_of_interest.name: The Dead Tree
points_of_interest.description: A massive hollow tree covered in webbing. Something large moves within.

points_of_interest.name: Cocoons
points_of_interest.description: Silk cocoons hang from branches. Some are disturbingly human-sized.

locations.name: Stonefield Farm
locations.description: A well-kept farm growing pumpkins and grain. The Stonefield family has worked this land for generations.

connections.description: The road leads back to Goldshire.
The pumpkin fields stretch to the south.
A path leads to the Maclure property.

points_of_interest.name: Farmhouse
points_of_interest.description: A cozy stone farmhouse with smoke rising from the chimney.

points_of_interest.name: Barn
points_of_interest.description: A large red barn filled with farming equipment.

locations.name: Pumpkin Fields
locations.description: Vast fields of pumpkins stretching toward the forest edge. Billy Stonefield watches over them, keeping an eye out for pests — both animal and gnoll.

connections.description: The farmhouse is visible to the north.
The forest grows wild to the west. Gnoll tracks are visible.

locations.name: Maclure Vineyards
locations.description: Rolling hills covered in grapevines. The Maclure family produces fine wine here, though the feud with the Stonefields has soured relations.

connections.description: The road leads to Goldshire.
A path leads toward the Stonefield farm.
The vineyards give way to wild forest.

points_of_interest.name: Vineyard House
points_of_interest.description: An elegant farmhouse overlooking the vines.

points_of_interest.name: Wine Cellar
points_of_interest.description: A stone cellar where wine barrels age.

locations.name: Western Forest Edge
locations.description: The western fringe of Elwynn Forest. Defias bandits have been spotted along these roads, preying on travelers.

connections.description: The crossroads lies to the east.
Smoke rises from deeper in the woods.
Gnoll howls echo from the southwest.

locations.name: Defias Hideout
locations.description: A hidden camp where Defias bandits plan their raids. Tents and crude fortifications surround a central fire pit.

connections.description: Slip back into the forest.

points_of_interest.name: Defias Tents
points_of_interest.description: Ragged tents housing the bandits.

points_of_interest.name: Stolen Goods
points_of_interest.description: Crates of stolen merchandise piled near the fire.

locations.name: Gnoll Territory
locations.description: The southwestern reaches of Elwynn, claimed by the Riverpaw gnoll tribe. Their camps dot the hillsides, and patrols are frequent.

connections.description: A trail leads back toward civilization.
The Stonefield farm lies to the east.
A hill looms to the south. The gnolls grow more numerous.

locations.name: Hogger's Hill
locations.description: A rocky hill where the infamous gnoll warlord Hogger has established his stronghold. Gnoll warriors patrol constantly, and the sounds of their savage rituals echo through the night.

connections.description: Retreat down the hill.

points_of_interest.name: Hogger's Camp
points_of_interest.description: A fortified gnoll camp at the hilltop. Bones and trophies decorate crude wooden posts.

points_of_interest.name: Gnoll Firepit
points_of_interest.description: A large fire pit where gnolls gather. Something unpleasant is roasting.

locations.name: Fargodeep Mine Entrance
locations.description: The entrance to the Fargodeep Mine. Mining carts and equipment sit abandoned, and kobold chatter echoes from within.

connections.description: The road returns to Goldshire.
Descend into the mine.

points_of_interest.name: Mine Office
points_of_interest.description: A small shack where the supervisor tracks shipments.

points_of_interest.name: Abandoned Carts
points_of_interest.description: Mining carts overturned and covered in dust.

locations.name: Fargodeep Mine - Upper Tunnels
locations.description: Narrow mine tunnels shored up with wooden beams. Kobolds scurry in the darkness, their candles flickering. 'You no take candle!'

connections.description: Climb back to the surface.
A passage leads deeper into the mine.

locations.name: Fargodeep Mine - Lower Tunnels
locations.description: The deeper reaches of the mine. Kobold geomancers have claimed this area, and their earth magic has reshaped the tunnels. Veins of gold glitter in the walls.

connections.description: Return to the upper tunnels.
A fortified passage leads to the deepest chamber.

locations.name: Goldtooth's Lair
locations.description: The deepest chamber of the mine, claimed by the kobold leader Goldtooth. Piles of ore and stolen goods surround his crude throne.

connections.description: Flee back up the tunnel.

points_of_interest.name: Goldtooth's Throne
points_of_interest.description: A pile of ore and crates fashioned into a crude seat.

points_of_interest.name: Treasure Pile
points_of_interest.description: Stolen goods, ore, and glittering gold dust.

locations.name: Southern Forest
locations.description: The wild southern reaches of Elwynn. The canopy grows thick here, and dangerous creatures lurk in the undergrowth.

connections.description: Return to the vineyards.
The forest thins toward Westfall.

locations.name: Westfall Border
locations.description: The western edge of Elwynn Forest. Beyond lies Westfall — a land of golden fields, but also poverty and danger. The road ahead looks dusty and dry.

connections.description: Return to the forest.
Continue into Westfall. (Not yet available)

points_of_interest.name: Border Sign
points_of_interest.description: A weathered sign reads: 'Now leaving Elwynn Forest. Westfall ahead. Travel at your own risk.'

locations.name: Gates of Stormwind
locations.description: The massive stone gates leading to Stormwind City rise before you. Guards in gleaming armor watch over all who enter.

connections.description: The road leads south into Elwynn.
Enter Stormwind City. (Not yet available)

points_of_interest.name: Valley of Heroes
points_of_interest.description: Statues of great heroes line the bridge into the city.
